Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edwardium.RPGEngine.Utility.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameSerializable

    public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameSerializable
    Class representing a rectangle in 2D space.
